ratings.comment: Excellent teacher, very clear and help, and the material was covered quite well.  I'd definitely recommend taking her class, had a great experience.
Ya, this professor is my most hated kind of teacher because she COULD NOT admit when she was wrong.  Not only that, but the quizzes were too long and the teaching was sub par at best.
I actually really enjoyed her.  I thought her lectures were very clear and organized.  The material on tests and quizzes was extremely fair.

I would not recommend her. I didn't mind chemistry prior to being in her class, but with her I hated going to class. She always messed up her demos and didn't know how to answer people's questions. Some quizzes weren't bad, but most were too long. The average in my discussion section was usually a D. Good luck if you have, you'll need it!

Nice professor but she wasn't very good at explaining things clearly. Not a fan of friday quizzes. Her midterms  were definitely fair and tested on what we learned in class/hw. Final exam wasn't anything like midterms though, much more difficult and time constraining.

She's somewhere between bad and abysmal. She couldn't take the hint that an extra 5 minutes at the end of class would help for her impossible quizzes... instead made early friday mornings a requirement so that we'd "have more time". She also disregarded showing any opposing viewpoints after giving a survey on moving quizzes to fridays. not a fan

I went for help in office hours and she was completely useless. Her ramblings are hard to follow and unorganized. There is no connection between the lectures, labs, quizzes, and tests. She screwed up most of the demos because she did not know what she was doing. YOu will have no cluie what your grade is throughout the class. Avoid her class.
Not an enjoyable experience. Made the class and material much harder than it should have been. Doesn't understand how to write a quiz/test so that students can finish it in time. Avoid.

Doesn't know what she's doing. Dumber than a brick. Screwed up most of thee demos. Can't study for tests with book or notes. Studying doesn't really help since it's all stuff that we spent one day in lecture on and not what we covered over and over again. Isn't at all helpful if you see her during office hours.

She was unhelpful, and didn't give answers to any practice problems. She also made things harder than they needed to be. Also, beware the comprehensive quiz. I don't recommend this professor.  She is also uncaring.  I had her exam and another 20 minutes apart, and she told me I better sprint when I finish hers.
She was unhelpful, and didn't give answers to any practice problems.  She also made things harder than they needed to be.  Also, beware the comprehensive quiz.  I don't recommend this professor

She expects you to fully understand the material before entering lecture, her lectures don't line up with the quizzes and labs, and she wastes a lot of time reviewing what she said last time instead of going in depth on new material.
